question:
In some countries, more and more people are becoming interested in finding out about the history of the house or building they live  in . 
What are the reasons for this?
How can people research this?
text: These days , trends have been gone towards the territory findings. In many states, a huge number of people are keenly concerned to discover the history of their residents. This essay will discuss the reasons behind it and will also suggest some  methods to find out the motive.

There could be many reasons behind the fact that people enquire about their residential areas. While individuals spend a lot of investiture to own a property and the other reason could be the concerns  one could consider before finalising it. For instance, if there is a criminal record of the area such as murder or any other mishaps happened, one would take care in future or restrains from such dwelling. This tells us about the rationale for the chronicle  of the building.

The history of the house could be found  either by searching the internet or by asking  the neighbours. This ensures valid information as they have been living there for a couple of years . Moreover, any article or documentary related to that specific building could be easily searched. For illustration, the neighbourhood provides the best details and facts , as they have been living there and could have   experienced  some incidents and heard about the statistics.

In conclusion, more and more people want to ascertain the area they are living in because they want to take some precautions before investing a huge amount. Surfing the internet and interviewing the people nearby, can provide adequate facts and figures about that particular household.

error_list.error_des: The singular countable noun investiture follows the quantifier lot, which requires a plural noun. Consider using a plural noun or a different quantifier.
